p: Two more cluster groups were detected on 6 th April 2020, originating from a religious gathering at Kuching, Sarawak, which led to 83 COVID-19 confirmed cases, and a wedding at Bandar Baru Bangi, Selangor, which resulted in 88 positive cases [ 38, 39]. A new subcluster of COVID-19 cases was identified in Rembau, by the MOH on 8 th April 2020. This subcluster was linked to the religious gathering at Sri Petaling, Kuala Lumpur. There were 27 people infected with SARS-CoV-2 virus [ 40].
